page.title: 06PUBLIC HOUSES IN PRIDDY
page.content: For a small village 3 pubs might seem excessive. Tourists and Cavers however offer the demand that supports them. The Hunters Lodge is about a mile east of the village centre. A meeting place for cavers from all over the world. A Free House with a good selection of real ales. The New Inn is situated oppoite the green. It has 2 bars, a restaurant and a small beer garden. The Queen Victoria Inn is also close to the green. One large bar and a large beer garden which was built in 1982. A picnic area is provided but you mustn't take your own drinks|
